name: Adewale Ayuba
description: '''Adewale Ayuba''' (born 25 March 1965), also known as '''Mr. Johnson''', is a Nigerian [[Fuji music|Fuji]] singer. Ayuba has referred to himself as the "Bonsue Fuji King" and “Bonsue Fuji Maestro,” a self-coined term for a sub-genre of Fuji music that he developed.
